website_summaries.verdict: A comfortable, luxurious folding chair when you need a more formal seating option.
pros: Padded seat and back are comfortable for long term use
cons: When folded, they aren't as compact as some other models

customer_reviews.title: Bottom made of cardboard, will break.
customer_reviews.text: BE WARNED: The bottom of the cushion is cardboard (the underside of the seat part). NOT metal. The cushion is nice. However, I purchased a couple of these chairs and the cardboard has broken on each one. Making it uncomfortable to sit on! I would recommend purchasing a chair with a solid metal bottom instead.
customer_reviews.author: JRR

customer_reviews.title: High quality, comfortable folding chair.
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair for my seated meditation. I used to sit half lotus, but as my age has increased along with knee pain, I find that this chair is just right for me. I am 6 feet tall and my buttocks rests comfortably on the well-padded seat. The back support supplied comfortable support for my lower back. And my feet are flat on the floor. The think padding allows for me to sit comfortably for long periods. It is very study.
customer_reviews.author: D. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Thick cushion
customer_reviews.text: Great chair! I love the thick cushion, it make prolonged sitting very comfortable. Pros: metal frame, thick cushion, good fabric Cons: legs is not the best thing for a hardwood floor. You need to put resin cap on it
customer_reviews.author: Joe Stewart

customer_reviews.title: comfort chair, folding chair
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable, cushioned chair that I have ever seen. Note that you have a choice of three colored fabric coverings. Got tired of the thin cushioned chair, so I tried this 2.5" thick cushion seat & am pleasantly surprised to discover such a product was available. Never seen one of these anywhere else, either in stores or group meetings in top tier hotels. Note the color options: red, blue & gray fabric. Strong, sturdy built for heavy people.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Whitlock

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, sturdy chair
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these chairs earlier, and after using it for a while, ordered another one. They are very sturdy and comfortable. I highly recommend them. The only thing I would criticize is the shipping container. Both times the box was open on the ends and the chair was exposed, but weren't actually damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Cfaith

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two 2-pack chairs, they arrived in damaged cardboard boxes, but the chairs are not damaged. Sturdy? They appear to be. Comfortable? No. Those chairs are the same height and depth as the Samsonite folding chairs that I own, but have thicker padding. They may be easier on your butt to sit on, but the thickness of the pad raises the sitting position, while back of the chair are same height as the ones (Samsonite) that don't have padding, making the back supporting position much lower. They are not comfortable to sit on and don't provide enough back support.
customer_reviews.author: Purple Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I paid for
customer_reviews.text: I had some trepidation over buying these, what with review of them being unusually small or not serviceable, but I needed 4 of these chairs to accommodate guests at my birthday party last month. I am pleased to tell you there is nothing wrong with these chairs. I had friends at my party of all sizes: petite, medium sized, and extra large. Nobody had any problems or discomfort being seated in them. The padding is cozy and ample. If you got a set with bad padding, you should contact the company who sells them because you likely got a faulty chair. Great product, good price, I will likely order more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: PathofChaos

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable chair ever
customer_reviews.text: It is very comfortable and sturdy. When I sat in it there was no sinking. The cushions are extra thick. I work from home so I will be comfortable working all day. It stays in place and there is no sliding. The color is a perfect match to my kitchen decor.😊 OMG...best chair ever.🙃
customer_reviews.author: Caramelgirl

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made, well padded folding chair. I find it comfortable, with back support way better than most folding chairs. I think the generous cushioning will prevent TB (Tired Butt), a problem I've encountered in the past with lesser chairs at long meetings and seminars. I'm not a small person, but I find the size to be fine. If in doubt, check the measurements, consider buying a "XL" size chair if necessary. This will be used for occasional extra seating, so I wanted one that would be easy to fold up and small enough to store easily when not in use. Highly recommended, and it seems to be a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie

customer_reviews.title: comfortable for infrequent use but don't stack them on top pf each other
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these from Amazon 2 years prior to this review. I like the chairs & have not found fault with them during that time, but we use them for guests & so we do not use them frequently. I'm 5'5" & the back hits me about waist to rib cage level.The only issue I have is that we have 8 of these chairs & store them by stacking them in 2's laying down & the metal frame of one chair will impress it'self into the foam of the chair it is laying on, creating a crease that takes 4 or so days to disappear. Other than that, I like the firmness of the cushioned seat .
customer_reviews.author: BookshireCrone

customer_reviews.title: uncomfortable but pretty
customer_reviews.text: We sent these chairs back. There were so nice looking and heavily padded which we liked. I believe when they designed these chairs the did not take in to account the thick padding consequently the area you sit on was extremely narrow and the back was heavily padded but then it put your back in a very uncomfortable and awkward position. We purchase them because we often host concerts at our house but these were just not good enough. They also seemed smaller than other folding chairs but I did not measure. Too bad because they are lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Moen

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these! When I got the first one,I liked it so much that I bought a second one.My dining table has 4 matching chairs and I needed 2 more for guests.I put these chairs on the ends and it looks great,as mixing chairs is chic now.These are so nice looking,comfortable,and affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended: Sturdy, nice looking, reasonable price folding chairs
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty great upholstered folding chairs - looks nice in our formal dining room, and so much nicer than unpadded cheapie folding chairs. Great value for the $, too. We bought four, and like them a lot! Would have given them a 5-star, except that after sitting in them following a long meal (90mins+), they were a bit uncomfortable -- but maybe all folder chairs would get uncomfortable?? Still recommended - much better than anything else we evaluated.
customer_reviews.author: LexiRod

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting this chair to be as comfortable as it is! The seat is firm but not to firm. I am able to sit in it for several hours and work. I am a calligrapher and some of my works requires me to sit and write for several hours. Other chairs cut me at the back of the legs...haven't experienced this yet I know the ho!lidays are months away I am considering ordering additional ones. As our friend (Gold de lox) said it "well this is just right." Lol
customer_reviews.author: Minerva BryantTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Chair poorly packaged
customer_reviews.text: I like the chair, which seems sturdy, and very comfortable. My concern is with the packaging, or handling by UPS, or both. Found the package leaning against the wall looking as though it had been through a war. I used a hole in the carton edge to pick it up, and the chair fell out the other edge, which had opened, onto the concrete walkway. It was only the heavy clear plastic it was wrapped in, that kept it from being damaged. Someone should complain to UPS, I wish I was there when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Paul G. Faini

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to store
customer_reviews.text: Only docked a star because I thought this was a little expensive when I bought it ($30). Now that it's cheaper, I don't see any reason it wouldn't be a 5 star rating. The pad is fairly thick, so I can sit in it comfortably for a couple hours at a time. I used to use it as a desk chair because I didn't have the most space. Now space is not a problem, so I don't use it at my desk. Always good to have the chair around the house now though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This chair was so comfortable and gorgeous that someone stole it!
customer_reviews.text: I had taken it for use at an outdoor dance performance as I took photos. By the time we were all done and packing up, it was nowhere to be found. The program director felt so bad. I told her not to worry. They were fortunately sold as pairs. I am removing a star only because they are not comfortable for anyone tall. I am 6'1" and the seat is not long enough to sit back comfortably. The cushioning though, was spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Davis

customer_reviews.title: Padding hard
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are very nice looking. Love the color combo of the gray and blue. They are easy to open and close. The only complaint I have is that I purposely purchased these chairs because of the generous 2" seat padding. Unfortunately, the padding is so firm that it defeats the purpose! I'm hoping that after enough use they will have a little more give to them. Time will tell, but if you are looking for a seat pad that is soft and comfy right off the bat, I'd have to say these are not it.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda D

customer_reviews.title: Great spare chairs
customer_reviews.text: Needed some extra chairs when we have lots of people over. These are very sturdy and comfortable. Nice cushion on bottom and back. Good rubber stoppers on the feet so you do not have to worry about your floor. Easy cleanup if needed. Folds very easily as well. Much better than plastic chairs and metal with no cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Jobo

customer_reviews.title: Good product, comfy chairs.
customer_reviews.text: Good comfy folding chairs, great for having company over. I bought these as my living room is too small to store enough chairs for when I have lots of friends over, so the chairs stay in a closet until I need them. They are very comfy and look good.
customer_reviews.author: jacob m

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Avoid at all cost unless you are going fishing. Very very stiff cushion, super uncomfortable for even 15 seconds. I've used a standard folding chair for years and added a cushion. This was a huge step backward. Avoid avoid
customer_reviews.author: Bobby T

customer_reviews.title: Got a big caboose? choose a different chair! Too small!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is great if you need an extra seat but its very uncomfortable. This chair doesn't seem to fit American standards, if you have a large caboose this will hurt like it does for me. Its short, and the seat itself is made for someone with a much smaller caboose than mine. If you have a large caboose look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella Whitmire

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color. Uncomfortable !
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 gray chairs for Thanksgiving. They sent 2 red and 2 gray. Oh well, I was willing to over look that. But these chairs are the most uncomfortable seating ever! The seat and back are too short and the padding feels like cement. You are better off going to Sams Club or anywhere else and picking out the correct color and so much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: A good, solid folding chair.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair to use in my bedroom so I don't sit on my bed as much. I wanted one with thick padding so as to provide at least some level of comfort. It does that well enough, but i don't think it is the chair for me. The chair is plenty solid and sturdy, but I am a bit of a wide body, and I wish the chair was wider so that it would be more comfortable to me. I will keep the chair, because it is always handy to have something like it around, but I will probably find something a little bigger to keep in my room.
customer_reviews.author: DeeCrutch

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable extra seating
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are well made, quite study, and comfortable enough to sit on for more than a few minutes. They fold up easily and store in a fairly narrow area. I plan to get another 2 of them. I recommend them for extra seating needs.
customer_reviews.author: janglin28

customer_reviews.title: MARGINALLY MISLEADING ADVERTISING: DOES NOT INCLUDE PICTURED FOLDING TABLE
customer_reviews.text: These chairs might be the best thing since wheat toast, but they need to remove the photo of the white folding table, that is pictured with these two chairs, because it is NOT included. Quit misleading the consumer, people! What good are the chairs without the table? Duh!
customer_reviews.author: Wingnut

customer_reviews.title: if i could leave a big fat 0 that is ...
customer_reviews.text: if i could leave a big fat 0 that is what i would do. these chairs (i purchased 8 of them and promptly returned them ) are made for small people. I am rather short (5"2) and the top of the back of the chair comes to about the middle of my back. i could not imagine asking my guests to sit in these chairs. although well padded they are clearly JUNK. DONT BUY THEM
customer_reviews.author: DOG MOM

customer_reviews.title: comfy
customer_reviews.text: I use these for my classes, they are way better than the steel ones and thin padded type. well made and worth it on your tushy
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: This chair taught me what real pain is.
customer_reviews.text: This chair really hurts the cheeks if you sit in it for 30+ mins. If you’re lucky like I was they’ll send you 2 chairs when you order one so if your booty hurts you can swap out chairs until that one is too torturous to sit in. Other than that it has pretty good height, is comfy for the first few minutes, back is a little weird but if you’re sitting straight it should be no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Lena Pennellatore

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for my elderly Father!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my Dad who is in assisted living to sit on while we visit through the window! He was sitting on the wooden arm of a futon before!!! Folds easily out of the way for him to lean against the wall and be out of the way in his small rooms. Very comfy he says.
customer_reviews.author: Couldn'thinkofanythingelse

customer_reviews.title: Foldable and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite chair, for me it os better than sofa ^-^ Small but somfortable
customer_reviews.author: Theo K

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable chairs
customer_reviews.text: Bought these chairs for my sons who I home school and they are great. Well built and padding is very comfortable. Would definitely recommend and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Paul and Wendy Wood

customer_reviews.title: A sturdy chair, but not something I can enjoy sitting ...
customer_reviews.text: A sturdy chair, but not something I can enjoy sitting in for more than a few moments. the seat area is small, I am not a big person, 6 foot, 170 pounds and fit, chair just not comfortable for long term seating.
customer_reviews.author: Wes McFarland

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Purchase, Easy To Put Away.
customer_reviews.text: I share a room with my brother and space is precious. He has a bulky desk chair he'd use as gaming chair and I hated walking around it everyday. So I got this chair for him to replace it. It's a real space saver and it's actually very comfortable for a folding chair.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: Got these for the kids online classrooms. Seems to fit a teenage kid fine. The cushion is pretty thick but the height of the back is pretty low. Seems they forgot to raise the back in proportion to the thickness of the cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Mathis

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Chairs
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are so comfortable and great for the price, you get 2 for one price. I bought 4. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Seat too short
customer_reviews.text: The chairs look nice and are very sturdy but very uncomfortable. If you sit so your back is against the chair back, you feel like you are leaning way back. And the front of the chair hits wrong so it feels way too short. Would not be comfortable for a very long sit time.
customer_reviews.author: Dajamogu

customer_reviews.title: If you need extra seats for that party...
customer_reviews.text: You'd get gtod deal on these chairs. They are made well and the only problem I've had with them is the seat foam being super firm. I think it will break in over time, but my worry is that it will go from one extreme to the other. Since I won't be using these that much, shouldn't be a problem for awhile. Much more worried about my cat using them as a scratching post.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Fahey

customer_reviews.title: Very nice folding chairs
customer_reviews.text: I really like these chairs. They are comfortable and take up little space when folded away. I use them when we get together with friends or family and need extra seating space. I bought two a couple of years ago and liked them so much I bought these. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: ERBS

customer_reviews.title: Well made folding chairs
customer_reviews.text: I personally would have liked the backs of the chairs to be higher than it is. The chair is still more comfortable than the usual metal folding chair.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B.

customer_reviews.title: A stury folding chair that needs to be a bit bigger
customer_reviews.text: Flash Furniture's Hercules Series chair is made of quailty material and is well made. It should last years. I agree with other reviewers however, about the chair's geometry. The backrest is quite low, and the seat feels shallow - not deep enough to feel fully "planted" in the seat. I'm a 5' 10", 145 pound male and would prefer a chair about 20% larger overall. The chair's finish is textured, paint quality is very good, and the seat cushion very comfortable - just a bit too small.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick

customer_reviews.title: 1 pack 1 or 2 chairs???
customer_reviews.text: This chair is beautiful and well built. Nice design. How ever the add seems to suggest one pack had 2 chairs. I was looking for 2 chairs. I could have purchased one equally well designed at the store at a better price.
customer_reviews.author: Mistybluez

customer_reviews.title: Just like the basic, with cushion.
customer_reviews.text: Just like the folding chairs of yester-years except with a cushion. Great for extra seating or what I purchased for was a table/desk chair for my niece to use in her room. (Homework and crafts.)
customer_reviews.author: babyboop73

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: So glad that I found these. We use them for craft shows and they are so much more comfortable than the old chairs that we were using that had very little padding in the seat and a hard back. Seat is padded and comfortable. Back is padded and comfortable. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy chair
customer_reviews.text: I am using this for chair yoga at home. It's sturdy and since it folds up, when I get finished, I can just store it anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: D C  Browder

customer_reviews.title: Squeaks when moving around in it.
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy the first couple of weeks but then it started squeaking. Perhaps it needs some oil some places but nobody else seemed to write about this so I will mention it. Very comfortable and sturdy and still use them. They may want to consider sending some grease with them I think.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic comfort, very sturdy and great value
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6' 3" and over 200lbs and find this chair very sturdy and comfortable. With this outstanding value I couldn't imagine purchasing another kind. So glad I bought enough for my project.
customer_reviews.author: Derby City David

customer_reviews.title: Chair is not as pictured! very misleading - false add!
customer_reviews.text: The image of this chair shows a very thick seat pad, the chair I received has a very thin seat pad! misleading image that was the only reason I selected this item over a less expensive alternative! It's too bad that we had no choose but to use it otherwise I would have returned it!
customer_reviews.author: WaltSharpIdea

customer_reviews.title: Hard Chair, Despite Padding
customer_reviews.text: The chair is sturdy, but it absolutely kills my lower back. I sat in the chair for two hours, and I could barely walk once I got out of the chair. The padding is very hard and will kill your back.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Not the most comfortable chairs, but adequate for short-term use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these chairs to use while waiting for my furniture to be delivered on a long distance move. While they served a purpose; I didn't think they were very comfortable. If the need came up again; I would purchase something else.
customer_reviews.author: Expressed Reviews

customer_reviews.title: good quality & comfort
customer_reviews.text: My wife has a fused back and needed something to work on her art projects that was portable and comfortable. I was impressed with the quality. Other reviewers had mentioned the back support being low. It works well for my wife at 5'. I'm 6' and thought it was actually very comfortable. Support was right in the small of the back. I bought one to see if it would fulfill the needs we had. After the spending a little time with the chair, we have now ordered a second.
customer_reviews.author: Dean M. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable chair
customer_reviews.text: The chair has a fairly low back, but it was comfortable and not nearly as hard as some of the reviews made it sound. It was significantly better than the ordinary metal folding chairs we had been using. We haven't used it enough to know how durable it is, but it has served our purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: Paris

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect chair for sitting for long periods. The usual ones create pain and I've gone thru a number of them until I stumbled across this one. Great chair
customer_reviews.author: Randal Blanchette

customer_reviews.title: Great as a spare or extra chair
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small, comfortable chair for working at my project table in my office. I picked a folding chair to have the option to get it out of the way. About the only thing missing is being able to roll it around like an office chair, but that's being picky. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ken S. Tsuda

customer_reviews.title: Sure beats sitting on the floor.
customer_reviews.text: Needed a foldable chair for a small office space. this chair is very comfortable, shipped quite fast, and seems very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Vandivier

customer_reviews.title: Great for long term sitting!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these chairs for a board gaming table. Games can often last several hours, I needed something that was both durable and comfortable. These chairs check both boxes well. They fold up for easy storage, but they also seem well built, and have thick cushions for plenty of comfort. Great chairs!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy,  but so uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've had this chair since December 2017 and it's still going strong. It's very sturdy and feels secure, but the thick padding does nothing to add to comfort.
customer_reviews.author: RedSakura

customer_reviews.title: Not very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The back does not extend high enough and the seat cushion is thick. Combined, they make for an unsupported back except for the lumbar area. Well-made but not well-designed.
customer_reviews.author: B. Warner

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the frame work
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this item 4 times, the frames kept bending. We are not all over weight, the structure of the frames seem to be defective. I finally requested a refund and ordered others chairs, so far no issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: beckylee

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love the chair. Read the reviews and won’t use it as a stool. It does have a fiberboard base for the seat cousin. But, it is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda W.

customer_reviews.title: Great folding chair
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 8 of these chairs over a six year period. They are very well built and comfortable. When the time comes I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas P. Chester

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable folding chair
customer_reviews.text: This turned out to be a great computer chair. The padding is firm and thick - seller shipped quickly (no issues) and I consider it a quality piece. For the money, this was the best chair/best price that I found. Would buy again, if needs be. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: J. Crickenberger

customer_reviews.title: Good folding chair that is very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the most comfortable folding chair I have ever sat in. The seat cushion is extremely deep and incredibly comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Panico Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Good chairs
customer_reviews.text: nice chairs. Good thick seat. I got these for my grandmother and her elderly friends to play cards/ dominos on. My friends and I are also now using these to play canasta and poker as the seat pads are so comfortable. Light weight, easy to move chairs. Only down side is that the material does not appear to be water/ drink proof. We had a little spill and it took 3 days for the seat to dry out. Otherwise they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Babs101

customer_reviews.title: I Love These Chairs
customer_reviews.text: We have two 6 ft folding tables but didn’t have any folding chairs. WhenI saw these chairs on line they looked so comfortable and the best part is they are the exact same colors of my toss pillows and chair back pillows. They are sturdy, comfortable and the price was right
customer_reviews.author: MinnieGalJeanne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Extra Seating
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed and substantial. Seat cushion is thick and comfortable. Good back support. Bought 4 for extra seating. Easy to fold for storing.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Setterstrom

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful chair .
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband, who is somewhat handicapped so he could have a chair in his bedroom. He absolutely loves it. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Foureyes

customer_reviews.title: Posture supporting comfort
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my Mother & Sister to help with their homeschooling. They love the chairs and use them daily. I sat in the chairs - very comfortable with posture support. Super easy to fold and put away.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable easy fold chairs
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable easy to use convenient foldable chairs. Great for extra seating at cookouts or to sit outside for a nice breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Shal

customer_reviews.title: Really good product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the money. Could be a little too firm for a long sit. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Barry G.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap price, convenient storage, decently comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Works very well! Bottom cushion is a bit firmer than I expected but far more comfortable than a metal folding chair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All around excellent workmanship.
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive and useful. Beyond expectations. Cushion deep and firm -- very comfortable. Very solid structurally. Frame is very tight and well painted. Fabric on back and seat good quality and tight. All around excellent workmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Solid cushions, but low backs
customer_reviews.text: Solidly sturdy seat cushion, but backs are very low. Would have given 5 stars if backs were higher
customer_reviews.author: Catherine DuBois

customer_reviews.title: She tells me that is the perfect height for her sewing table and that the back ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my elderly mother who has severe back troubles. She tells me that is the perfect height for her sewing table and that the back is very comfortable. I have used it at her house, and I also find it very comfortable. It is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Slim2u

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and good value
customer_reviews.text: This chair is a great value, I've been using it as a desk chair for productivity and it is comfortable enough for extended periods of sitting on. The back support is A+, it provides ample support. The cushion is nice, but it could be softer/ deeper as you can feel the flat end as you sit, which is why I am docking one star.
customer_reviews.author: ACEofBASEFan

customer_reviews.title: They have a firm, comfortable cushion.
customer_reviews.text: I sit on the street for two hours every Saturday, at my water and sewer rate protest. The cushion is firm and comfortable; I never get tired sitting.
customer_reviews.author: Rycke A Brown

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and impressively comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS CHAIR. +It's comfortable +It's cheap +It folds + It has a cover for your back and for your butt This is no $500 office chair you can sit in for 6 hours without any annoyance, but it's the best cheap chair I've ever put my tush in.
customer_reviews.author: Salim

customer_reviews.title: Nice strong chairs
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for extra dinning chairs when needed. They are heavy duty. Nicely cushioned, a little stiff straight out of box but I'm sure they will wear in. Great for price
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: My bum is happy.
customer_reviews.text: I am sitting on it a lot, and my butt never hurts like most folding chairs will do. and my legs never go to sleep. I am 6'4" and have posture issues, I like this lower back as well. It reminds me to sit up right. So far so good, can't speak of life yet, but this is way better than the ones I got at Target.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl S.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Chair
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it! I have back issues and the bottom cushion is super comfy/supportive for me, as is the low backrest for back support! Superb quality, too! Sturdy & well made! It’s my new office chair - that’s how much I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great folding chair
customer_reviews.text: Only complaints is that over time, the foam where you sit will start flattening. And also, I wish the back rest was placed a little higher... Besides that, a very good folding chair
customer_reviews.author: mark84g5

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I use one for chair exercises and the other one is in my small bedroom so I have somewhere to sit other than on the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Corine Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and looks good
customer_reviews.text: These are very sturdy chairs however, because the seat is so thick the back of the chair hits your lower back instead of the middle back if they were not so thickly padded. But still a comfortable chair. Ordered 8 for church
customer_reviews.author: KCee

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are nice looking, comfortable, and sturdy. They fold away well for transport and storage, yet easily open to use. For folding chairs, they work well.
customer_reviews.author: L E Denyer

customer_reviews.title: Too short in back.  Hard cushion on seat.  I don't like it.
customer_reviews.text: No, Not for me. Too short in back. Doesn't sit at all like a regular padded folding chair. Cushion is also hard. It's probably 6 inches shorter than a normal folding chair. This would kill my back... I just pushed it aside for emergency seating....
customer_reviews.author: quality & comfortTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: I have a fairly small kitchen dining area so these chairs are perfect for my situation. They truly are sturdy and comfortable. The only drawback for me is that the back is a little too low however, I'm on the tall side. For those buyers who intend to fold them away until need, I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A folding chair you can sit in that doesnt hurt your back
customer_reviews.author: Rob Bucher

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable chairs
customer_reviews.text: very happy with these chairs. I bought 4 for having people over and people of all sizes found them comfortable. Bought 4 more of the same. The thick padding really does make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs, nice pattern and color
customer_reviews.text: I just finished my craft room and realized I didn't have any chairs - so after looking through a bunch I decided on this one. The chairs are sturdy, the cushion is very cushiony, and the pattern and color of the fabric was great. While I did give the chair a five, because overall it's well made - the back seems shorter than most metal folding chairs I've come across. I do have a long torso, but it still hits me further below the shoulder blades than is really comfortable.... but while doing crafts I'm rarely bent back.. and usually "hunched" forward :) Nonetheless, I was very happy with the purchase. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: comfortable Folding Chairs
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are used for overflow company at a conventional height table. My guests commented on how comfortable they were. They're also very easy to fold and unfold when needed. They arrived well packaged (2 to a box) and I did not find any damage on them when they arrived. The chairs are very sturdy and can accomodate a larger-sized or heavier weight individual without worry.
customer_reviews.author: Paleogal

customer_reviews.title: rugged and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am a resident in an assisted living environment and the chairs are or any guest that I might have. The chairs are not used much but they are just right for my needs
customer_reviews.author: Bud

customer_reviews.title: Built Ruggard
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are heavy duty and very comfortable. When you pick them up, you can feel the ruggedness in the construction. Too soon to comment on wear and quality of the fabrick.
customer_reviews.author: Charles F.

customer_reviews.title: Creaky and the pad is already breaking down
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this chair for a month anfld it's already creaky. It is so loud when you sit down or get up. The seat pad is already starting to break down
customer_reviews.author: Randall Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Great chair. Very well built.
customer_reviews.text: I’m 230 lbs and this chair supports me with ease. Very sturdy. Not an outdoor chair.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and well built
customer_reviews.text: These chairs were going to be temporary replacements for some old folding chairs. These were much better than expected so they are the main chairs in the area.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Wife uses it for sitting at the sewing machine. Super thick and comfortable seat.
customer_reviews.author: R. L. Weber

customer_reviews.title: Comfy chairs - nice design
customer_reviews.text: I had a group at the house and 11 out of 12 thought the chairs were perfect. The other guy won't be invited back.
customer_reviews.author: susieQzQz

customer_reviews.title: I had no problem with the depth of the seat.
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about how deep/long the seat was based on previous reviews, but I had no problem with the depth of the seat. It is wide enough too. I am 5'3". The chair is awesome too and nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Dana

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed for comfy folding chairs
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to use for spare dining chairs. I needed comfort and the padding is just that. And the color closely matches the olor of the covers on our real chairs.
customer_reviews.author: jrsteen159

customer_reviews.title: Flash Furniture - HERCULES Series Premium Foldable chair
customer_reviews.text: These foldable chairs are strong and well cushioned. They are so comfortable to sit in. You wouldn't know from the feel that you were sitting in a foldable chair. Very attractive too. A lot of cushion! Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

product_meta.title: Flash Furniture HERCULES Series Premium Curved Triple Braced & Double Hinged Navy Fabric Metal Folding Chair
product_meta.description: Color:Navy Fabric/Gray Frame| Size:1 PackEnsure that your guests, clients or parishioners pay more attention to you than the clock with these ultra-comfortable folding chairs. Folding chairs are a practical choice for social activities and everyday use in the home due to their compact storage capabilities. These metal folding chairs are commercial grade to withstand heavy and daily usage in any industry. Take your regular group meetings outdoors instead of staying in a stuffy room or host beautiful outdoor events with the arrangement of these padded folding chairs. While suitable for outdoor use store indoors to protect the frame from extreme moisture. Its 18-gauge triple braced curved steel frame supports up to 300 pounds while the non-marring floor glides protect your flooring from scuffs and scrapes. The uses are endless with multi-purpose chairs to fulfill your seating needs for your business or home. With nothing to assemble these chairs come ready to service your needs.
feature_bullets: If you want to make your visitors happy you'll need to keep a few of these upholstered metal folding chairs on hand. With an extra thick cushioned seat you can conduct business meetings and game night with ease.
Navy patterned fabric upholstery - 2.5" thick foam padded seat - 18 gauge steel frame holds 300 lbs. - riveted steel components - CAL 117 fire retardant foam
Suitable for outdoor events - store indoors to protect the frame from extreme moisture
Top Review: This chair has a very sturdy metal frame which does not flex at all. The frame has a good-quality powder coat. The seat has a generous amount of foam and is very comfortable.
PRODUCT MEASUREMENTS >>> Overall Size: 18.5"W x 19"D x 29"H | Folded Size: 18.5"W x 4"D x 37.5"H | Seat Size: 15.75"W x 15.75"D x 18.75"H | Back Size: 18"W x 14.5"H
